Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.1: And the spirit lifted me up, and brought me into the east gate of the house of the Lord, which looketh towards the rising of the sun: and behold in the entry of the gate five and twenty men: and I saw in the midst of them Jezonias the son of Azur, and Pheltias the son of Banaias, princes of the people.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.2: And he said to me: Son of man, these are the men that study iniquity, and frame a wicked counsel in this city,
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.3: Saying: <u>Were not houses lately built</u>? This city is the caldron, and we the flesh.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.4: Therefore prophesy against them, prophesy, thou son of man.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.5: And the spirit of the Lord fell upon me, and said to me: Speak: Thus saith the Lord: Thus have you spoken, O house of Israel, for I know the thoughts of your heart.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.6: You have killed a great many in this city, and you have filled the streets thereof with the slain.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.7: Therefore thus saith the Lord God: Your slain, whom you have laid in the midst thereof, they are the flesh, and this is the caldron: and I will bring you forth out of the midst thereof.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.8: You have feared the sword, and I will bring the sword upon you, saith the Lord God.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.9: And I will cast you out of the midst thereof, and I will deliver you into the hand of the enemies, and I will execute judgments upon you.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.10: You shall fall by the sword: I will judge you <u>in the borders of Israel</u>, and you shall know that I am the Lord.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.11: This shall not be as a caldron to you, and you shall not be as flesh in the midst thereof: I will judge you in the borders of Israel.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.12: And you shall know that I am the Lord: because you have not walked in my commandments, and have not done my judgments, but you have done according to the judgments of the nations that; are round about you.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.13: And it came to pass, when I prophesied, that Pheltias the son of Banaias died: and I fell down upon my face, and cried with a loud voice: and said: Alas, alas, alas, O Lord God: wilt thou make an end of all the remnant of Israel?
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.14: And the word of the Lord came to me, saying:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.15: Son of man, <u>thy brethren</u>, thy brethren, thy kinsmen, and all the house of Israel, all they to whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem have said: Get ye far from the Lord, the land is given in possession to us.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.16: Therefore thus saith the Lord God: Because I have removed them far off among the Gentiles, and because I have scattered them among the countries: I will be to them a little sanctuary in the countries whither they are come.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.17: Therefore speak to them: Thus saith the Lord God: I will gather you from among the peoples, and assemble you out of the countries wherein you are scattered, and I will give you the land of Israel.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.18: And they shall go in thither, and shall take away all the scandals, and all the abominations thereof from thence.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.19: And I will give them one heart, and will put a new spirit in their bowels: and I will take away the stony heart out of their flesh, and will give them a heart of flesh:
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.20: That they may walk in my commandments, and keep my judgments, and do them: and that they may be my people, and I may be their God.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.21: But as for them whose heart walketh after their scandals and abominations, I will lay their way upon their head, saith the Lord God.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.22: And the cherubims lifted up their wings, and the wheels with them: and the glory of the God of Israel was over them.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.23: And the glory of the Lord went up from the midst of the city, and stood over the mount that is on the east side of the city.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.24: And the spirit lifted me up, and brought me into Chaldea, to them of the captivity, in vision, by the spirit of God: and the vision which I had seen was taken up from me.
Ezeckiel or Ezechiel__11.25: And I spoke to them of the captivity all the words of the Lord, which he had shewn me.
